author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Splatoon 3 North American League is here! Assemble your most elite Inklings and Octolings (or just your friends) and get ready to compete (or just have fun).
 
The first event begins Sept 20.

Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/
 
And get ready for the Splatoon 3 North American League Show a new weekly web show all about the Splatoon 3 North American League, featuring highlights, interviews, and more!
 
The show debuts Sept 19.
 
And on top of all that, we’ll be running a just-for-fun Salmon Run competition every Sunday for some casual cooperative play. See you at the first Splatoon 3 North American League Sunday Scrim on Sept 21.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https:
title: Splatoon 3 North American League - Announcement
